title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Yumeneko no Kuni no Nyanii
synopsis: When a comet that comes back once in a hundred years, Dream Suisei, is travelling by Earth, everybody sees the same dream of a foreign world. Melonpanna saves an egg from being crushed and wakes up to find out that the egg has followed her home.
voices: ['Toda, Keiko', 'Nakao, Ryusei', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Yanagisawa, Michiyo', 'Kimotsuki, Kaneta', 'Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Shimamoto, Sumi', 'Kanai, Mika', 'Masuoka, Hiroshi', 'Nishimura, Tomomi']
staff: [['Yano, Hiroyuki', ['Director']], ['Ootani, Kazuo', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Aoyama, Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']], ['Maeda, Minoru', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
